Vendor fills the paid featured listing form and clicks “Submit Now”.

AJAX → backend validatePaidFeaturedListing

Laravel validates all property fields + files.

If invalid → return JSON error → show SweetAlert.

If valid → no save yet, just respond: “Validation passed, please pay”.

On success → open Stripe payment modal.

Vendor enters card, Stripe JS returns stripeToken.

AJAX → backend storePaidFeaturedListing with:

stripeToken

all listing form data + files (from FormData we saved).

Backend:

Charges Stripe.

If success → create listing + listing images (your existing logic).

(Optional) create invoice record.

Frontend: show green toast + info SweetAlert, then redirect.
